name: potato kil u or frend
description:
dont!! die from tato!! pass it to your friend with spacebar.

tato will explod in 10 to 40 business seconds.

air movement is slow. not my bug. blame webgl, btw if explod in air last person to toucha dies.

music stolen from pixxy, its in their game go check it out https://pixxydoesthings.itch.io/hot-potato-bomb

feed my ego by giving me a "cool game" in the comments
